How about you piss the fuck off rather than making baseless assumptions?

I've been playing since early 2011, so yes, I'm past my 4 year mark. I don't make qq posts consistently whilst claiming "hurr I no longer play league BUT I STILL GO ON THEIR FORUMS TO BITCH ABOUT A GAME I DON'T PLAY"

It hasn't been that long since I quit, like 2 - 3 weeks, I am pretty sure I haven't completely lost track on this game's current situation yet.

If you participate a game for more than a few months and with enough bucks spent, one has every right to express how the delivery sucks and why the product promised is not delivered nor has it actually improved much over the half a decade period at all.

While it's true f2p companies usually use "you don't have to pay" excuse to justify their shietty game and service, but it's something Riot said they WON'T do (to their credit they haven't done it), which was one of the things that got me into this game in the first place.

So there is no excuse when things sucked for literally years and they never got around to fix it, everyone has a threshold for tolerance, and I have reached mine, and I don't think I am being unreasonable here.

If you're happy with the game, more power to you, however for me I am just done with a company that after countless people's years of anticipation and monetary support, continues to wander around at square one.

They made some progress and stepped out a little, yes, but really, 5 years already in game development we should be expecting a journey or at least a few milestones instead of a few steps. It's not unreal expectation.
